name: Lost and Lit
description:
!!$# Bug Warning #$!! 

Due to an audio glitch once you win the game, you might want to turn down the volume =)

Welcome to Lost & Lit, a race against the light, you are a scout who got lost on a camping trip, to save yourself from the things in the night, you must turn on all the lights . Don't let you battery run out either, don't get lost and stay lit =)

(Made as a part of the Jame Gam (yes, you read that correctly))

Programmer, Animator and Level Design - Jolly Joe

Artist,  Music and SFX - Neiroe

Game Design and Artist - Drew
